Package application.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CFADataBase
    Integration class to interface between frontend and backend
    Customer
    Central class that links the FXML, CSS, and controller files to display the GUI.
    CustomerController
    Returns an Image object that can then be painted on the screen.
    ExcessItem
    Excess Item is a class gets and sets necessary items for an Excess Item.
    HomeController
    Used to controll the Home GUI landing page
    IngredientItem
    IngredientItem is a class used to set and get necessary data for an Ingredient Item.
    ManagerExcessReportController
    ManagerExcessReportController contains the java needed to produce the Excess Report for our POS system.
    ManagerIngredientController
    ManagerIngredientController contains the java needed to interact with the manager inventory fxml file.
    ManagerInv
    ManagerIngredientController contains the java needed to interact with the manager inventory fxml file.
    ManagerMenuApplication
    Implements the manager ability to add and remove menu items.
    ManagerMenuController
    The controller for the manager's ability to add and remove menu items.
    MenuItem
    Menu Item is a class gets and sets necessary items for an Menu Item.
    PostgreSQL
    Abstraction class to query and update the PostgreSQL database given SQL commands
    ReportController
    Used to control the report GUI landing page
    RestockItem
    Class for use in the 'ObservableList' in RestockReport.java to present data to the frontend
    RestockReport
    Controller for the Restock Report page (RestockReport.fxml), used to present the items that are lower than the threshold to the manger.
    SalesItem
    Sales Item is a class gets and sets necessary items for an Sales Item.
    SalesReport
    Used to generate sales reports for the manager
    SalesReportController
    Controller used to generate sales reports for the manager
    XZReportsController
    Controller used to generate XZ reports for the manager
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CFADataBase.Table
